title: WTB: Two T206 Bock Hooker cards in poor condition
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: WTB: Two T206 Bock Hooker cards in poor condition
posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy two beater Bock Hooker T206, the brand doesn't matter. I would prefer cards that: 1) are not clipped, 2) do not have writing or stamps, 3) have a fully legible player name, and, importantly, 4) are cheap.

Please send me a PM if you are interested.

Thanks for considering my post.

posts.post_title: might get more hits on your post if the title read
posts.post_content:
Looking for a couple cheap Hookers. Any condition.


Sorry, couldn't resist. ;)
I considered somethig like that but had two worries: 1) I might get in trouble if my wife looked over my shoulder as I read the messages, and 2) people might have included high-quality scans.
